thread.title: Missing college student's accused murderer appears in court

title: Missing college student's accused murderer appears in court
text:
Missing college student's accused murderer appears in court 9:17am EST - 01:30 
Sam Woodward makes his first court appearance after he's charged with killing former high school classmate Blaze Bernstein, a UPenn college student who went missing in California while home for the holiday break. Linda So reports.
